defaultError.title: Oops, something went wrong
defaultError.detail: Due to a technical error, you cannot finalize the process at this moment. Please try again, or save the application for later.

productSummary.title: Real estate-secured loan
productSummary.description: Now available with a term of up to 30 years and a higher maximum loan amount.

bullets.text: A loan of up to 30 million CZK
bullets.description: Once approved, the money will be transferred to your business account.
Use this loan to finance your business activities. Approval is fast and easy.

bullets.text: Repayment term of up to 30 years
bullets.description: Thanks to the collateral, we offer a longer repayment period and lower monthly repayments.
Both residential and non-residential properties, including land in the Czech Republic, can be used as collateral.

productSummary.arrangementSectionHeaderTitle: What the expect during the loan application

arrangementBullets.description: Call your banker for more information

• Two forms of ID
 • A document authorizing business activity.
 • Two full tax returns.
 • Property details + current photos of the interior and exterior.
No need to specify purpose of the loan.  Use this loan to finance your business activities. Approval is fast and easy.

calculator.title: Who are we contacting?
calculator.dateSectionHeader: When is the best time to contact you?

time.title: Time
time.info: Schedule the call anytime between 9 am to 5 pm.

calculator.calculatorSectionHeader: What amount are you interested in?
calculator.collateralType: What property are you using as collateral?

victory.title: Done! Our banker will get in touch with you soon.
victory.detail:
We've sent a summary of your request to your email {email}.

We will contact you soon to discuss the details.
If you need to make any changes or have any questions, feel free to contact our Helpline..
